caption.center: JOHN THOMAS WOODWARD, ET AL, Appellants, v. JOHN STEELE, ET AL,

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Three.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Grant County, No. 24828, Fred Van Sickle, J., entered March 11, 1977.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed as modified and remanded with instructions by unpublished opinion per Roe, J., concurred in by Munson, C.J., and McInturff, J.
